description.full: Enter the worlds of five beloved Disney•Pixar movies - The Incredibles, Ratatouille, UP, Cars, and Toy Story - to become a unique character using Kinect for Xbox 360, and have your photo taken with your Pixar friends! Then share your Kinect Rush Snapshots online!
description.short: Enter the worlds of five beloved Disney•Pixar movies - The Incredibles, Ratatouille, UP, Cars, and Toy Story - to become a unique character using Kinect for Xbox 360, and have your photo taken with your Pixar friends! Then share your Kinect Rush Snapshots online!
